mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO `teach_class_card`(id, mac_id, equipment_name, teach_class_room_id, class_id, classroom, class_slogan, school_id, update_by, update_date, create_by, create_date, del_flag, boot_day_of_week, start_boot_time_of_day, end_boot_time_of_day) values
( #{item.id},#{item.macId},#{item.equipmentName},#{item.teachClassRoomId},#{item.classId}, #{item.classroom},#{item.classSlogan},#{item.schoolId},#{item.updateBy},#{item.updateDate},#{item.createBy}, #{item.createDate},#{item.delFlag},#{item.bootDayOfWeek},#{item.startBootTimeOfDay},#{item.endBootTimeOfDay} )
mapper.select: SELECT card.id, card.mac_id macId, card.school_id schoolId, school. NAME AS schoolName, CONCAT_WS( '-', room.school_type_name, room.teach_building, room.teach_building_num, room.floor, room.room_num ) AS locationName FROM teach_class_card card LEFT JOIN org_school school ON school.id = card.school_id LEFT JOIN teach_class_room room ON room.id = card.teach_class_room_id WHERE card.del_flag = 0 AND ( card.is_synchro = 1 OR card.is_synchro IS NULL )

SELECT a.id, a.equipment_name equipmentName, CONCAT(c.teach_building, '-', c.floor, '-', c.room_num) locationName FROM teach_class_card a, teach_class_room c WHERE a.teach_class_room_id = c.id AND a.school_id = #{schoolId,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND a.teach_class_room_id IS NOT NULL AND a.class_id = '' AND a.del_flag = 0 AND c.del_flag = 0 ORDER BY a.update_date DESC

SELECT DISTINCT teacher_id teacherId, type, class_id classId, cycle_id cycleId FROM ref_teacher_class rtc LEFT JOIN teach_cycle tc ON rtc.cycle_id = tc.id WHERE rtc.teacher_id = #{teacherId} AND tc.id = (SELECT id FROM teach_cycle ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT 1) AND (rtc.type = 1 OR rtc.type = 2)
